entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 3.0°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late in the morning then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 13 February 2023
